title: Annie Knight's Hottest Bikini Photos: Barely-There Tops, Cheeky Thongs
description: Annie Knight has no shortage of revealing bikinis.
content:
Annie Knight has no shortage of revealing bikinis.

From plunging one-pieces to itty bitty sets, the OnlyFans model has slayed in a number of swimsuits through the years.

One design that she always circles back to is a red-and-white gingham look, featuring triangle cups, halter straps and delicate bow embellishments.

The rest of the swimsuit features tiny bottoms with high-cut straps that tie around her hips. Knight wore the bikini while soaking up the sun in July and while kicking off the new year in January.

Besides the gingham look, Knight has rocked a trendy black set with white polka dots while vacationing in Cancún. The two-piece was complete with halter straps and a cheeky backside.

When it comes to one-pieces, Knight always makes sure they're just as sexy. In July 2025, she turned up the heat in a bright blue design that plunged to her waist.

Keep scrolling to see photos of Knight's best bikini moments through the years:

Knight stunned in a red-and-white gingham bikini equipped with white bows in Australia.

Knight showed off her curves in a bright blue one-piece in Australia.

She wore a black-and-white polka dot set while posing in front of the sea in Cancún.

Knight showed off her sun-kissed skin in a patterned bikini and white baseball cap in Australia.

She slipped into a cherry red swimsuit featuring a sweetheart neckline and gold hardware while staying in Palm Springs, California.

Knight stunned in a tartan swimsuit while tanning in Palm Springs, California.

The blonde beauty wowed in a textured green bikini featuring a triangle top and low-waisted bottoms in Mexico.

She displayed her bronzed glow in a nude bikini equipped with razor-thin straps in Thailand.

Knight turned heads in a floral bikini finished with a gold pendant dangling from her straps.

Knight sizzled in a sage green bikini fearing an asymmetrical neckline in Australia.

The model shared a pic in a brown bikini finished with white straps in Bali.

This story was originally published August 27, 2025 at 3:49 PM.
summary: Annie Knight, a model for OnlyFans, has been known for her revealing bikinis. One of her most memorable designs is a red-and-white gingham design featuring triangle cups, halter straps, and delicate bow embellishments. Other notable swimsuits include a black set with white polka dots in Cancún and a bright blue one-piece in Australia. In 2000, Knight wore a revealing blue one piece in a swimsuit that plunged to her waist. She also showcased her bronzed skin in a patterned bikini in Australia and a nude bikini in Thailand.
shortSummary: Annie Knight has showcased her stunning bikini designs, including a red-and-white gingham, while holidaying in Cancún and Australia.

scraped_sources.text:
Stars have no shortage of stylish swimsuits.
This year, Hollywood’s favorites, including Gisele Bundchen, Simone Biles, Bella Hadid, Kim Kardashian, Brittany Mahomes, Hailey Bieber and more have shown off their bikini style in super sexy looks.
Take Mahomes, who slayed in a bubblegum pink suit only one month after giving birth to her daughter Golden, whom she shares with Patrick Mahomes. The number featured thick straps, a square neckline and a textured silhouette. She paired the look with clear Saint Laurent sunnies and smiled softly at the camera.
Biles also looked effortlessly cool in a leopard-print bikini on February 20 while enjoying a trip to South Africa with her husband, Jonathan Owens. Her set featured a halter triangle top and cheeky bottoms, which she accessorized with layered necklaces and black shades.
Keep scrolling to see the sultriest bikini moments of 2025:

Annie Knight
Annie Knight is an Australian content creator best known for her work as a podcast host, influencer and OnlyFans model. Knight spent her childhood in Gold Coast, Australia, and attended the University of Melbourne where she studied science.
Knight initially worked a job in marketing in Brisbane, but left to pursue content creation and build her personal brand. She gained attention for her candid discussions about relationships and sex, eventually launching her podcast Annie Knight Unhinged, where she shares personal stories and interviews guests on topics related to dating and intimacy. Her unfiltered approach attracted a large online following, leading her to join OnlyFans where she further expanded her audience and income. She has also made media appearances discussing her career and later sparked further public interest after successfully sleeping with 583 men in six hours in an attempt to break a world record.
The OnlyFans star began dating Henry Brayshaw in November 2024. The pair got engaged the following March.

argos_summary: Annie Knight, an Australian OnlyFans model and podcast host, has showcased a variety of swimsuits—from gingham halter bikinis to bright blue one‑pieces—across trips to Australia, Cancún, Palm Springs, Mexico, Thailand, and Bali. Her wardrobe highlights include triangle‑top designs, high‑cut bottoms, and playful patterns, reflecting her playful beach style. The article also briefly notes other celebrities such as Gisele Bundchen, Simone Biles, Bella Hadid, Kim Kardashian, Brittany Mahomes, and Hailey Bieber flaunting fashionable swimsuits in 2025. Additionally, it outlines Knight’s background as a science student, marketing professional, and content creator who gained notoriety for candid discussions on relationships and a record‑breaking sexual feat. Knight recently became engaged to Henry Brayshaw.
